settings.title: OUR CLUB MEMBERSHIPS
settings.text: Our wine and spirits clubs are the perfect way to follow along on our importing adventure.

settings.productDescription:
A guaranteed allocation of our most exclusive single-casks of Armagnac, Calvados and
Cognac.
6 freshly-landed bottles per quarter, directly from the cellars of our European producers.
12 freshly-landed bottles per quarter, directly from the cellars of our European producers.

settings.title: HOW IT WORKS
settings.text:
Club members are guaranteed an allocation of our latest arrivals from Europe.  As part of either club, you’ll also get access to special releases and a 15% discount on all purchases throughout the year.

On the spirit side, we offer one membership option: 

A guaranteed allocation of our most exclusive single-casks of Armagnac, Calvados and Cognac.

Each cask is individually selected by our tasting panel as exemplary from the cellars of both well-loved and largely undiscovered producers.

You will receive your allocation 3-4 times a year as special casks present themselves.

Pricing varies based on the size of
the casks and the type and age of spirit. We target an average allocation of 2-4 bottles with an average price ranging from $80-$250 per bottle.

For spirits that are more expensive and exclusive, we will send out an email allowing you to opt in prior to billing.

On the wine side, we offer two club options: 

** A deep dive into our latest wine arrivals, of 12 bottles per quarter directly from the cellars of our European producers.

**An introduction to our latest arrivals, of 6 bottles per quarter.

settings.title:
Join the
Bien Élevé family
settings.text: All our wine and spirits news that’s fit to print, delivered once a week. Receive our newsletter for first access to new arrivals, special offers, bottle reviews and more.
